item.title: Hailly add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "It's frightening when things you love appear suddenly changed from what you have always known." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Kinky Friedman
item.description: "But the most dangerous thing in the world in the world is to run the risk of waking up one morning and realizing suddenly that all this time you've been living without really and truly living and by then it's too late. When you wake up to that kind of realization, it's too late for wishes and regrets. It's even too late to dream." -- Kinky Friedman

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "Poor Congo, barefoot bride of men who took her jewels and promised the Kingdom." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Francis Hodgson Burnett
item.description: "Where you tend a rose my lad, a thistle cannot grow." -- Francis Hodgson Burnett

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Wally Lamb
item.description: "Love is like breathing, you take it in and let it out." -- Wally Lamb

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Wally Lamb
item.description: "Accept what people offer. Drink their milkshakes. Take their love." -- Wally Lamb

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Wally Lamb
item.description: "I am not a smart man, particularly, but one day, at long last, I stumbled from the dark woods of my own, and my family's, and my country's past, holding in my hands these truths: that love grows from the rich loam of forgiveness; that mongrels make good dogs; that the evidence of God exists in the roundness of things. This much, at least, I've figured out. I know this much is true." -- Wally Lamb

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Jose Saramago
item.description: "Just as the habit does not make the monk, the sceptre does not make the king." -- Jose Saramago

item.title: Hailly add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "And so with the sunshine and the great bursts of leaves growing on the trees, just as things grow in fast movies, I had that familiar conviction that life was beginning over again with the summer." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Hailly add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "I hope she'll be a fool -- that's the best thing a girl can be in this world, a beautiful little fool." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Jose Saramago
item.description: "Why did we become blind, I don't know, perhaps one day we'll find out, Do you want me to tell you what I think, Yes, do, I don't think we did go blind, I think we are blind, Blind but seeing, Blind people who can see, but do not see." -- Jose Saramago

item.title: Hailly add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "Perhaps only in a world of the blind will things be what they truly are." -- José Saramago

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Howard C. Cutler Dalai Lama
item.description: "I think that if one is seeking to build a truly satisfying relationship, the best way of bringing this about is to get to know the deeper nature of the person and relate to her or him on that level, instead of merely on the basis of superficial characteristics." -- Howard C. Cutler Dalai Lama

item.title: Hailly add a quote by Wally Lamb
item.description: "I think... the secret is to just settle for the shape of your life takes...Instead of you know, always waiting and wishing for what <i>might </i> make you happy." -- Wally Lamb
